00033 void BookType::Reset()
00034 {
00035         //cout << " (BookType) Reset()" << endl;
00036         clearAuthors(); // sets authors = 0;
00037 
00038         title = "";
00039         authors = new string [4]; //allocate
00040         publisher = "";
00041         isbn = 0;
00042         price = 0.0;
00043         numberOfCopiesInStock = 0;
00044         numberOfAuthors = 0;
00045 }

00055 void BookType::clearAuthors()
00056 {
00057         if (authors != 0)
00058         {
00059                 //cout << " (BookType) clearAuthors() ... delete [] authors" << endl;
00060                 delete [] authors;
00061         }
00062         authors = 0;
00063 }

00075 BookType::BookType(const BookType & otherBook)
00076 {
00077         authors = 0;
00078         //cout << " (BookType) (Copy Constructor) authors = 0" << endl;
00079 
00080         //cout << " otherBook: " << endl << otherBook << endl;
00081 
00082         Reset();
00083         Copy(otherBook);
00084 }

00098 const BookType & BookType::operator=(const BookType & otherBook)
00099 {
00100         // Avoid self-assignment
00101         if (this != &otherBook)
00102         {
00103                 Copy(otherBook);
00104         }
00105         return *this; // The value of the object that was just assigned.
00106 }

00122 bool BookType::operator>(const BookType & otherBook) const
00123 {
00124         long volumeIsbn;
00125         long volumeIsbnOther;
00126         getIsbn ( volumeIsbn      );
00127         getIsbn ( volumeIsbnOther );
00128 
00129         return (volumeIsbn > volumeIsbnOther);
00130 }

00169 bool BookType::operator==(const BookType & otherBook) const
00170 {
00171         // Checking against self ?
00172         // This is an address comparison (i think)  OTHERWISE it will be infinite recursion.  AAA!
00173         if (this != &otherBook)
00174         {
00175                 // Get the data from this object.
00176 
00177                 // Local variables
00178                 string   volumeTitle;
00179                 string   volumePublisher;
00180                 long     volumeIsbn;
00181                 double   volumePrice;
00182                 unsigned volumeCopies;
00183                 unsigned volumeAuthCount;
00184 
00185                 getTitle                 ( volumeTitle     );
00186                 getPublisher             ( volumePublisher );
00187                 getIsbn                  ( volumeIsbn      );
00188                 getPrice                 ( volumePrice     );
00189                 getNumberOfCopiesInStock ( volumeCopies    );
00190                 getNumberOfAuthors       ( volumeAuthCount );
00191 
00192 
00193                 // Get the data from the object we are comparing to.
00194 
00195                 // Local variables
00196                 string   volumeTitleOther;
00197                 string   volumePublisherOther;
00198                 long     volumeIsbnOther;
00199                 double   volumePriceOther;
00200                 unsigned volumeCopiesOther;
00201                 unsigned volumeAuthCountOther;
00202 
00203                 otherBook.getTitle                 ( volumeTitleOther     );
00204                 otherBook.getPublisher             ( volumePublisherOther );
00205                 otherBook.getIsbn                  ( volumeIsbnOther      );
00206                 otherBook.getPrice                 ( volumePriceOther     );
00207                 otherBook.getNumberOfCopiesInStock ( volumeCopiesOther    );
00208                 otherBook.getNumberOfAuthors       ( volumeAuthCountOther );
00209 
00210 
00211                 // Equality comparison happens here.
00213                 if      (
00214                         volumeTitle             == volumeTitleOther             &&
00215                         volumePublisher == volumePublisherOther &&
00216                         volumeIsbn              == volumeIsbnOther              &&
00217                         volumePrice             == volumePriceOther             &&
00218                         volumeCopies    == volumeCopiesOther    &&
00219                         volumeAuthCount == volumeAuthCountOther
00220                         )
00221                 {
00222                         // All equal so far. Now check each author.
00223                         // Both have the same number of authors.
00225                         string auth;
00226                         string authOther;
00227                         for(unsigned a = 0; a < volumeAuthCount; a ++)
00228                         {
00229                                 getAuthorAt (auth, a);
00230                                 getAuthorAt (authOther, a);
00231                                 if(auth != authOther)
00232                                 {
00233                                         return false;  // Authors do not match exactly.  Inequal.
00234                                 }
00235                         }
00236                         return true; // Everything matches exactly. Equal.
00237                 }
00238 
00239                 return false;  // Members do not match exactly.  Inequal.
00240         }
00241         else
00242         {
00243                 return true; // this == this.  So they are equal.
00244         }
00245 }

00292 void BookType::Copy(const BookType & otherBook)
00293 {
00294         //cout << " (BookType) Copy() ..." << endl;
00295         clearAuthors(); // deallocates and sets authors = 0;
00296 
00297         otherBook.getTitle(title);
00298         otherBook.getPublisher(publisher);
00299         otherBook.getIsbn(isbn);
00300         otherBook.getPrice(price);
00301         otherBook.getNumberOfCopiesInStock(numberOfCopiesInStock);
00302         otherBook.getNumberOfAuthors(numberOfAuthors);
00303 
00304         authors = new string [4]; //allocate
00305 
00306         string auth;
00307         for(unsigned a = 0; a < 4; a++)
00308         {
00309                 otherBook.getAuthorAt(auth, a);
00310                 //cout << "COPY CONSTRUCTING AUTHOR... " << a << " auth value: " << auth << endl;
00311                 setAuthorAt(auth, a);
00312         }
00313 }

00522 void BookType::setAuthorAt ( const string & a , const unsigned & idx )
00523 {
00524         //cout << "    setAuthorAt() string: " << a << "  idx: " << idx << endl;
00525 
00526         if (idx < numberOfAuthors)
00527         {
00528 
00529                 string s;
00530                 s = a;
00531                 authors[idx] = s;
00532                 //cout << "SET AUTHOR: " << a << endl;
00533         }
00534 }
00535

00539 
00548 void BookType::getAuthorAt ( string & theStr, const unsigned & idx ) const
00549 {
00550         if (idx < numberOfAuthors)
00551         {
00552                 theStr = authors[idx];
00553         }
00554 }

00566 void BookType::toString(string & outstr) const
00567 {
00568 
00569         string title;
00570         getTitle(title);
00571 
00572         outstr.append("Title:             ");
00573         outstr.append(title);
00574         outstr.append("\n");
00575 
00576         stringstream ss;
00577         string appStr;
00578 
00579         unsigned authCount;
00580         getNumberOfAuthors(authCount);
00581 
00582         ss << authCount;
00583         ss >> appStr;
00584 
00585         outstr.append("Number of Authors: ");
00586         outstr.append(appStr);
00587         outstr.append("\n");
00588 
00589         string auth;
00590         for (unsigned aa = 0; aa < authCount; aa++)
00591         {
00592                 getAuthorAt(auth, aa);
00593 
00594                 ss << aa;
00595                 ss >> appStr;
00596 
00597                 outstr.append("Author ");
00598                 outstr.append(appStr);
00599                 outstr.append(":          ");
00600 
00601                 ss << auth;
00602                 ss >> appStr;
00603 
00604                 outstr.append(appStr);
00605                 outstr.append("\n");
00606         }
00607 
00608         long isb;
00609         getIsbn(isb);
00610         ss << isb;
00611         ss >> appStr;
00612         outstr.append("ISBN:              ");
00613         outstr.append(appStr);
00614         outstr.append("\n");
00615 
00616         unsigned num;
00617         getNumberOfCopiesInStock(num);
00618         outstr.append("Copies in stock:   ");
00619         ss << num;
00620         ss >> appStr;
00621         outstr.append(appStr);
00622         outstr.append("\n");
00623 
00624         double thePrice;
00625         getPrice(thePrice);
00626         outstr.append("Price:             ");
00627         ss << thePrice;
00628         ss >> appStr;
00629         outstr.append(appStr);
00630         outstr.append("\n");
00631 
00632 }

00648 ostream & operator<<(ostream & os, const BookType & b)
00649 {
00650         // This is basically a "to string" routine.
00651 
00652         string title;
00653         b.getTitle(title);
00654         os << "Title:             " << title << endl;
00655 
00656         unsigned authCount;
00657         b.getNumberOfAuthors(authCount);
00658 
00659         os << "Number of Authors: " << authCount << endl;
00660 
00661         string auth;
00662         for (unsigned aa = 0; aa < authCount; aa++)
00663         {
00664                 b.getAuthorAt(auth, aa);
00665                 os << "Author " << aa << ":          " << auth << endl;
00666         }
00667 
00668         long isb;
00669         b.getIsbn(isb);
00670         os << "ISBN:              " << isb << endl;
00671 
00672         unsigned num;
00673         b.getNumberOfCopiesInStock(num);
00674         os << "Copies in stock:   " << num << endl;
00675 
00676         double thePrice;
00677         b.getPrice(thePrice);
00678         os << "Price:             " << thePrice << endl;
00679 
00680         return os;
00681 }
